name: Tropical Vacations
description:
A simple platformer made in Godot for the Mini Jam 50: Islands.

Help Gordon Fleaman get a beer to drink while vacationing in a private island.

Assets used:

Island Blocs [16x16 tileset] - Ivan Voirol: https://opengameart.org/content/island-blocs-16x16-tileset
Classic Hero - GrafxKid: https://opengameart.org/content/classic-hero
Animal Enemies 10 Pack - OnixGames: https://opengameart.org/content/animal-enemies-10-pack
Mug of Beer - NiceGraphic: https://opengameart.org/content/mug-of-beer
bevouliin Free Beach game background for game developers - bevouliin.com: https://opengameart.org/content/bevouliin-free-beach-game-background-for-game-de...
